description: I've created a table outlining a proposed schedule for your 20,000 square foot warehouse project in Lake City, GA. This timeline aims to accomplish all tasks within 90 days, including structural engineering, architectural plans, MEP (Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing) design, and 3D rendering. Phase Task Duration Due Date Payment Schedule 1 Project Kickoff & Initial Consultation 3 days Day 3 10% of total fee 2 Conceptual Design & Schematic Layout 10 days Day 13 15% of total fee 3 Structural Engineering Analysis 14 days Day 27 20% of total fee 4 Architectural Plans Development 21 days Day 48 20% of total fee 5 MEP Design 14 days Day 62 15% of total fee 6 3D Rendering 14 days Day 76 10% of total fee 7 Final Review and Revisions 7 days Day 83 5% of total fee 8 Project Completion & Deliverables 7 days Day 90 5% of total fee Please note that this timeline is ambitious and may need to be adjusted based on the structural engineer's workload and the complexity of the project13. The payment schedule is structured to align with key milestones and deliverables throughout the project. Some key considerations for the structural engineer: The timeline allows for overlap between some phases to maximize efficiency. The structural engineering analysis is given priority to ensure a solid foundation for subsequent design work. 3D rendering is scheduled towards the end of the project when most design elements are finalized4. A final review period is included to address any necessary revisions or adjustments. When presenting this proposal to the structural engineer, emphasize that you're open to discussing adjustments to the timeline if needed, while still aiming to complete the project within the 90-day timeframe. Additionally, be prepared to provide any specific requirements or constraints for the warehouse that might impact the design process Must be licensed in the State of Georgia.
title: Structural engineer / architectural plans / MEP / 3D rendering

description: I'm looking for a bookkeeper to help me catch up on bookkeeping. There are a few banks that don’t provide QBO files for download, so I’ll need assistance with uploading data from PDFs or Excel into QuickBooks and ensuring everything is accurate. I prefer someone local but if you are able to communicate with me regularly feel free to apply. The ideal candidate should be very familiar with QuickBooks Desktop software and interested in working with me long-term. If you’ve read this far and aren’t just applying with a script, please start your message with the @ symbol so I can identify genuine applicants. Thank you!
title: Quickbooks Desktop Bookkeeper in Las Vegas

description: We are a leading Educational SaaS (Software as a Service) company looking for a motivated and experienced Sales Development Representative (SDR)/Appointment Setter to join our team. As an SDR, your primary role will be to identify and qualify potential leads, engage with prospects, and schedule appointments for product demos with our sales team. Key Responsibilities: Conduct outbound prospecting to generate new leads through various channels. Qualify leads based on predefined criteria to ensure they meet our target audience. Engage with prospects via phone, email, and other communication channels. Educate leads about our educational SaaS solutions and their benefits. Schedule appointments for product demos with qualified leads. Maintain accurate records of lead interactions and appointments in our CRM system. Collaborate with the sales team to optimize lead conversion rates. Qualifications: Proven experience as an SDR or Appointment Setter in a B2B environment. Familiarity with CRM software and sales communication tools. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Strong ability to identify and qualify potential leads. Self-motivated, goal-oriented, and results-driven. Knowledge of the education sector or SaaS industry is a plus. Fluent in English (additional languages are a bonus). What We Offer: Competitive hourly rate plus commission-based compensation structure. Flexible working hours and the opportunity to work remotely. Ongoing training and professional development. Collaborative and supportive team environment. How to Apply: If you're a driven SDR/Appointment Setter with a passion for education and technology, we'd love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and a brief cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you're the ideal candidate for this role.
title: SDR - Appointment Setter For SaaS Education Company

description: Ecommerce brand in need of bookkeeping services. Maintain detailed records of all costs associated with acquiring and producing products, including shipping, handling, and storage fees. Accurate COGS calculation for determining profitability and setting appropriate pricing strategies. Looking for long term relationship with a true pro.
title: E-Commerce Bookkeeper

description: Small Business Process, System, and Workflow Expert Position: Small Business Process, System, and Workflow Expert Company: Bush & Bush Law Group Location: Dallas, Texas (Remote or Hybrid options available) About Us: Bush & Bush Law Group is a fast-growing personal injury law firm based in Dallas, Texas. We are committed to delivering exceptional service to our clients while ensuring efficiency and effectiveness in all aspects of our operations. To support our growth, we are seeking a Small Business Process, System, and Workflow Expert to optimize our operations and streamline our workflows across all departments. Key Responsibilities: Analyze current business processes, systems, and workflows across all departments, identifying inefficiencies and areas for improvement. Design and implement streamlined workflows and systems tailored to the needs of a personal injury law firm. Develop and document standard operating procedures (SOPs) to ensure consistency and quality across all tasks and processes. Collaborate with leadership and department heads to assess pain points and align operational strategies with business goals. Create automated systems or recommend tools to enhance productivity, reduce redundancies, and ensure seamless task management. Provide training to staff on new workflows, systems, and processes to ensure smooth adoption and implementation. Regularly evaluate and refine workflows to adapt to the evolving needs of the firm and industry. Qualifications: Proven experience in process improvement, system implementation, and workflow design for small businesses, preferably in the legal or professional services sector. Strong knowledge of project management tools, process automation software, and operational frameworks. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to assess complex systems and propose practical solutions. Effective communication and collaboration skills, capable of working with diverse teams. Detail-oriented mindset with a focus on driving efficiency and productivity. Preferred Skills: Experience working in or with law firms, especially in personal injury. Familiarity with legal practice management software and tools. Understanding of compliance and regulatory considerations in the legal industry.
title: Business process and workflow

description: We are seeking a detail-oriented Payroll Specialist to manage payroll for our employees and ensure timely tax payments. The ideal candidate will be responsible for calculating wages, processing payroll, and maintaining accurate records. Familiarity with payroll software and relevant tax laws is essential. If you're organized, reliable, and can work under deadlines, we'd love to hear from you. Join our team and help us streamline our payroll process while ensuring compliance with local and federal regulations.
title: Payroll Preparation and Tax Compliance Specialist

description: Join the development team of Surreality, a transformative platform that combines cutting-edge AI-driven technology, grief therapy, and memory preservation. Surreality’s vision is to help individuals preserve cherished memories, reconnect with loved ones through AI-generated Digital Essences, and find healing through immersive and empathetic experiences. This revolutionary platform leverages AI, VR/AR, and blockchain technology to redefine how we process grief and nostalgia, providing tools to create lifelike digital representations of loved ones, immersive virtual environments, and secure spaces for emotional reflection. Surreality also integrates its proprietary cryptocurrency, SurrealiCoin, to support its ecosystem and future expansion. Within this role, you will play a vital part in building the platform’s core functionalities, ensuring scalability, and delivering meaningful experiences that blend emotional depth with technological innovation. By joining the Surreality team, you will contribute to a groundbreaking project that bridges the gap between technology and humanity. The ideal candidate will be skilled in designing secure, high-performance server-side systems and integrating AI/ML models into applications. This role is essential for ensuring the platform's reliability, scalability, and data security across all devices. Responsibilities: Backend Architecture Development: Design and implement scalable, cloud-based backend systems to support multimedia storage, AI processing, and VR/AR functionalities. Develop APIs for seamless integration between mobile apps, AI features, and immersive environments. Security and Compliance: Ensure user data is encrypted and secure, adhering to GDPR, HIPAA, and other global privacy standards. Implement role-based access controls and data management protocols. Integration and Optimization: Work with AI/ML engineers to integrate and deploy machine learning models for real-time interactions. Optimize backend systems for performance and scalability, ensuring a smooth user experience during peak loads. Collaboration: Collaborate with frontend developers, AI/ML engineers, and VR/AR specialists to align backend functionalities with user-facing features. Support DevOps pipelines for deployment, testing, and scaling. Data Management: Develop efficient storage solutions for multimedia content and AI training data. Enable intuitive search and retrieval mechanisms for user-uploaded content. Requirements: Proficiency in backend development using Node.js, Python (Django/Flask), Ruby on Rails, or similar frameworks. Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, or Firebase for scalable infrastructure. Strong knowledge of database systems (SQL and NoSQL). Expertise in API design and implementation (REST, GraphQL). Understanding of data encryption, security standards, and compliance regulations. Experience deploying and managing machine learning models in production is a plus. Compensation: Payment will be approved upon funding completion. Team members will also receive SurrealiCoin tokens as part of their compensation, offering a stake in the platform’s long-term success. Team Confirmation for Investors: This position will be reserved as part of our official team presented to investors. While no immediate work is required until funding is secured, confirming your role demonstrates our readiness to proceed with development. Once funding is complete, work will begin immediately, and compensation will be issued as per the agreed terms. Questions for Applicants: Have you developed scalable backend systems for platforms handling multimedia data? What experience do you have with integrating AI/ML models into backend systems? How do you approach data encryption and compliance with privacy regulations like GDPR or HIPAA? Which cloud platforms and database systems are you most comfortable working with? What is your expected timeline for developing and deploying a backend infrastructure for the platform? Next Steps: Please share your resume, portfolio, and a brief explanation of how your experience aligns with Surreality’s vision and technical requirements. If selected, you’ll play a critical role in building a secure, scalable platform that redefines grief therapy and memory preservation. Looking forward to hearing from you! Best regards, Dewight Andrew Rutherford Founder & Chief Visionary Officer, Surreality www.surrealityai.com
title: Backend Developer for Scalable and Secure Digital Platforms.

description: We are an event space in Miami Beach Florida looking for an expert in QBO to handle monthly reconciliations, prepare reports to evaluate project costing/profitability, and to confirm that are books are properly in order. Must have many years of experience, and be properly insured/bonded to ensure that we are safe working with you.
title: Looking for QuickBooks Online expert

description: I am a business owner in the software industry, selling solutions to barbers and barbershops. My primary method of prospecting involves Google Maps. I’m looking for an expert to help automate the process of identifying and contacting new barbershops listed on Google Maps in specific locations (e.g., Austin, TX). The goal is to set up a system that: 1. Automatically detects new barbershop listings in Google Maps based on a query (e.g., “Barber shops in Austin, TX”). 2. Saves relevant details (e.g., Name, Address, Place ID, Date Added) into a Google Sheet. 3. Sends me an alert (via email or other methods) whenever a new shop is added. Scope of Work - Integrate Google Maps API with Google Sheets using automation tools (e.g., Make.com/Integromat, Zapier, or custom scripting). - Set up filters to avoid duplicates and ensure only new listings are added. - Configure a notification system to alert me in real-time when new shops are detected. - Test the automation to ensure accuracy and reliability. Deliverables: - Fully automated system integrating Google Maps API, Google Sheets, and notification alerts. - Documentation or training on how to maintain or update the system if needed.
title: Automate Google Maps Data Retrieval and Notification System for Barbershop Prospecting

description: About Us: Our company is a fast-growing e-commerce company specializing in the sale of used and refurbished electronics, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, cameras, networking gear, and other consumer electronics. We operate across multiple online marketplaces and are committed to providing top-notch customer service and competitive pricing. Job Description: We are seeking an experienced e-commerce marketplace manager to join our team. We are looking for a person that is seeking a long term career to grow with our company. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of two years of management experience and a deep understanding of marketplace selling, particularly on the following platforms eBay, Walmart, Back Market, and Amazon. This role involves developing and implementing pricing strategies to maintain and grow our margins, manage product listings, optimize listings for visibility and sales, and ensuring exceptional customer service. Most of your day will consist of doing price research then setting pricing on products we have in stock, logging prices in Google Sheets, and reviewing current marketplace listings to monitor the listing quality. Prepare detailed reports and meet with owners and key stake holders frequently to discuss the state of the business along with future strategy. Key Responsibilities: - 70% of the job is to develop and execute pricing strategies to optimize margins and drive sales growth. - Manage and oversee product listings across multiple online marketplaces (eBay, Walmart, Back Market, Amazon). - Ensure all items are accurately listed, competitively priced, and optimized for search visibility and conversion. - Monitor marketplace trends, competition, and pricing to adjust strategies as needed. - Maintain a high standard of customer service, handling customer inquiries, issues, and feedback efficiently and professionally. - Collaborate with other departments, including marketing, inventory, and shipping, to ensure smooth operations and fulfillment. - Analyze sales data and marketplace performance to identify opportunities for improvement and growth. - Stay up-to-date with marketplace policies, best practices, and industry trends. Requirements: - 3+ years of experience in eCommerce management. - Proven experience with major online marketplaces (eBay, Walmart, Back Market, Amazon). - Expertise in the used/refurbished electronics category, including smartphones, tablets, laptops, cameras, and networking gear. - Strong understanding of marketplace dynamics, including listing optimization, pricing strategies, and customer service best practices. - Excellent analytical skills with the ability to provide and interpret sales data and market trends. - Exceptional organizational and multitasking abilities. - Strong communication and interpersonal skills. - Proficiency with e-commerce tools and software. - Detail-oriented with a commitment to accuracy and quality. Preferred Qualifications: - Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or related field. - Experience with inventory management systems. - Familiarity with SEO best practices for online marketplaces.
title: E-commerce Manager

description: I have an existing program C+. c# created using VB 2019 - It is a trading testing program. It is mostly a calculator with very limited graphic capabilities. My plan is to have this program mate with graphics suitable for trading study. I`ve been told it could be done with Excel, but I want to explore the possibility of having it created with a trade-oriented or quality graphics program. There is also the need for some minor additions to the calculator part of the program.
title: Market graphics needed for existing c+, c#, vb2019 program

description: We are excited to announce an opportunity for a highly skilled and motivated professional to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will play a crucial part in enhancing the performance and efficiency of our application. As a key member of our development team, you will optimize our existing codebase, implement advanced caching strategies, and fine-tune database performance to ensure our application operates at peak efficiency. The ideal candidate will possess a solid background in software development with a focus on performance optimization. You should have hands-on experience identifying and resolving bottlenecks within applications and a deep understanding of best coding practices that contribute to high-performance software. Your expertise will be essential in analyzing our current systems and processes, allowing you to propose and implement innovative solutions that significantly improve speed and responsiveness. In this role, you will collaborate closely with other developers, QA engineers, and product managers to understand the application's architecture and performance requirements. You will conduct thorough performance assessments and develop strategies for reducing load times and enhancing user experience. Additionally, you will be responsible for monitoring application performance metrics and generating reports that will inform our ongoing development efforts. Your responsibilities will also include staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies related to application performance. You will have the opportunity to experiment with new tools and methodologies that can further optimize our software. If you have a passion for software performance and a proven track record of successful optimizations, we are eager to hear from you! Join us in our mission to deliver a seamless and high-quality user experience. This is an exciting opportunity to make a significant impact on our application’s performance while working in a collaborative and innovative environment. If you thrive in fast-paced settings and possess a keen analytical mindset, we encourage you to apply and become a vital part of our team!
title: Application Performance Optimization Specialist

description: I am looking for a skilled and patient Computer Engineer and Programming Tutor to provide hands-on guidance in running Python code and developing software programs step-by-step. This role requires expertise in both macOS and Windows operating systems, along with the ability to explain technical concepts clearly and practically. The ideal candidate will assist with installing and configuring Python environments, including setting up IDEs such as PyCharm, VS Code, and Jupyter Notebook. They will teach programming concepts like variables, loops, functions, classes, and object-oriented programming (OOP) while demonstrating how to write, run, and debug Python code. Lessons should also cover virtual environments, package managers like pip and conda, and version control systems such as Git and GitHub for code management. Candidates should be prepared to troubleshoot compatibility issues, optimize system performance, and recommend productivity tools and debugging techniques. Experience with machine learning and computer vision models is a plus and may lead to opportunities for additional projects related to AI-driven applications. This role is ideal for someone passionate about programming, AI, and mentoring others to build and deploy software efficiently.
title: Personal Computer Engineer and Programming Tutor

description: I am seeking a knowledgeable and patient AI, Automation, and Software Development Fundamentals Tutor to teach the core concepts and tools needed to build software that leverages AI, automation, computer vision, deep learning models, and AI agents. This role focuses on providing clear, step-by-step instruction to help develop a strong foundation for creating AI-driven applications. The ideal candidate should have experience with machine learning, NLP, computer vision, deep learning frameworks, AI agents, and automation tools. They should also have a strong background in evaluating and selecting tools for document processing, language understanding, data analytics, data extraction, and system integrations. Lessons should cover topics such as data preprocessing, model training and evaluation, hyperparameter tuning, and AI deployment, using tools like TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, OpenCV, Hugging Face Transformers, and LangChain. Instruction will also include automation workflows with tools like Zapier, UiPath, and Selenium, as well as integrating AI models into scalable systems. Applicants must have hands-on experience building software applications and integrating AI technologies into real-world systems. They should be able to simplify complex topics, provide practical examples, and demonstrate how to create AI agents for automation and decision-making, along with strategies for extracting and analyzing data from documents and integrating AI solutions into broader workflows. This role is ideal for someone passionate about helping others build AI-powered software while leveraging advanced tools for language understanding, data processing, and automation.
title: AI, Automation and Software Development Fundamentals Tutor

description: WorkLife Partnership is currently looking to engage a Certified Salesforce expert to support routine maintenance and development of our Salesforce instance. The Administrator will support WorkLife with software updates and releases as prescribed by Salesforce, respond to user requests for additional functionality, address problems and issues as they arise, and provide other general administrative support. We are looking for someone who can help WorkLife prioritize requests to ensure we optimize limited time capacity. The position requires about 10-12/hours a week with at least ⅓ of availability during normal business hours (8 am-5pm Mountain Time). We are hoping to engage with someone who can guarantee support for at least 6 months. The Admin will work with both leadership and individual users to optimize WorkLife’s use of Salesforce functionality. Job Summary: The Salesforce Administrator will be responsible for overall management and maintenance of the Salesforce CRM system including data flow management, reporting and maintenance. The ideal candidate for this position must be self-sufficient with the ability to respond to periodic urgent requests. Responsibilities: -Serve as the primary Salesforce administrator with a 15+ user base -Handle all CRM administrative functions including user account maintenance, reports and dashboards, custom fields/objects, workflows, licenses, external apps/add-ons, and other routine tasks -Collaborate with various teams to translate programmatic goals into data and reporting solution -Develop and enhance dashboards, visualizations, queries, and reports to serve operational and analytical data needs -Preserve data integrity; ensure that new development doesn’t conflict with existing functionality -Complete regular internal system audits and prepare for upgrades -Develop internal training materials and user guides (as needed) -Provide technical support/assistance to internal users -Support ad hoc data queries as well as quarterly and annual impact reporting Required Experience -Minimum of 2-3 years’ experience working with Salesforce system preferably in a nonprofit environment -Strong understanding of Salesforce Sales Cloud along with hands on experience with all administrative functions such as user management, profiles, roles, permissions, rules, reports, dashboarding, queues, installing apps, and licenses -Ability to meet deadlines; handle and prioritize requests, and seek support in managing conflicting priorities -Exceptional communication skills; ability to communicate complex or technical concepts succinctly and clearly to non-technical audience WorkLife Partnership values the lived and learned experience of all candidates and is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workforce. We encourage qualified candidates with all different experiences and backgrounds to apply.
title: Salesforce Administor to support Salesforce admin and maintenance

description: We are building a web based graphical design application and are looking for a freelance UI designer who can give this the modern look and feel that it deserves. The software is a typical design software, supporting both vectors and bitmaps, with tools to design from scratch, filters, transformations, etc tailored to a specific industry. An important component of our web-based version is that it will use templates to let users preview the final product they are designing for. E.g. if they are designing a logo for a tshirt, they can select from a library of tshirts to see the final results.   A full product brief with description of all functionalities is available, including wireframes (which are open to suggestions and improvements). The deliverable would be a design+prototype in Figma for all pages, forms, tool sets, icons, cursors, buttons. To help us choose the best candidate for this job, we would ask all applicants to present a quick design of how they envision the look of such an application. We recommend just the initial page after login and it can be a screenshot of what you came up with. The sole purpose is to find the style that best matches ours.
title: UI/UX designer for a web-based graphics design application

description: About Us: At Vert Energy Group, we're redefining sustainable building practices, paving the way for a greener future. As a three-time Inc 5000 Fastest Growing Company, we’re not stopping at growth—we’re driving impact. Ready to be a key player in a mission that changes industries and lives? Let’s make it happen, together. Role Overview: The Executive Assistant to the Director of Revenue is not your traditional administrative role. We’re seeking a proactive, organized, and results-driven professional who thrives in fast-paced environments. This isn’t just about supporting leadership—it’s about driving operational efficiency, project coordination, and strategic alignment. With strong project management skills and a passion for data-driven decision-making, you’ll help bridge the gap between vision and execution. If you have experience in marketing or sales and excel at streamlining workflows, analyzing data, and optimizing processes, this role is for you. Responsibilities and Qualifications: o Proactive Problem-Solving: Anticipate roadblocks, identify solutions, and ensure tasks are executed seamlessly with minimal oversight. You’re always two steps ahead. o Project Management Excellence: Oversee and coordinate marketing and sales initiatives, manage deadlines, and optimize workflows across teams. You keep complex projects on track. o Communication Mastery: Act as the liaison between the Director of Revenue, leadership, and teams. Strong written and verbal communication is essential for aligning strategies and sharing key updates. o Data-Driven Execution: Utilize Excel to organize, analyze, and present data on KPIs, trends, and performance metrics. Your insights drive smarter decisions. o Marketing & Sales Alignment: Support campaign planning, CRM management (e.g., HubSpot), and sales processes. Familiarity with marketing and sales workflows is a big plus. o Process Optimization: Design and implement systems to enhance efficiency. Develop templates, checklists, and tools that make work easier and better. o Adaptability and Agility: Manage shifting priorities and multiple tasks with ease. You excel in a fast-paced, evolving environment. o Tech-Savvy Solutions: Comfortable working with project management tools like Monday.com, CRM platforms like HubSpot, and AI tools to automate and streamline processes. o Confidentiality and Professionalism: Handle sensitive information—like budgets, sales data, and executive decisions—with the utmost discretion. Our Mindset: At Vert, everything we do aligns with our Core Values: o Put Vert First: Prioritize the team and company mission. We win together. o Innovate or Die: Embrace process improvement and automation. Find smarter ways to deliver results. o Nothing is Impossible: Face challenges head-on and find solutions to make progress. o Own Your Mistakes: Learn, adapt, and implement changes to grow from every challenge. o Radical Candor: Give candid, respectful, and constructive feedback to elevate performance. o Data-First: Use numbers, not assumptions, to drive decisions. Job Type: Full-time Pay: $60,000.00 - $80,000.00 per year Benefits: 401(k) with matching Health, dental, and vision insurance Life insurance Paid time off Professional development assistance Schedule: 8-hour shift, Monday to Friday Occasional overtime as needed Experience: o Project Management: 2 years (Preferred) o Marketing or Sales Support: 2 years (Preferred) o Data Analysis (Excel): 2 years (Required) o CRM Tools (e.g., HubSpot): 2 years (Preferred) o AI Tools or Process Automation: 2 years (Preferred)
title: Executive Assistant for Director of Revenue - Sustainable Energy

description: We’re looking for a UX/UI Designer to shape the user experience for an AI/ML-powered EdTech platform. This app will redefine how students and educators interact with learning tools. Your mission: to design user-friendly, visually compelling interfaces that enhance educational experiences while simplifying AI/ML features for all users. Nice-to-Haves: - Familiarity with EdTech user personas, including students, educators, and administrators. - Experience designing for gamification or engagement-driven learning experiences. - Knowledge of accessibility standards and designing for inclusive learning environments. If this opportunity excites you, we’d love to see your work! Please include a link to your portfolio showcasing relevant projects, particularly those involving EdTech, AI/ML applications, or data-driven platforms.
title: UX/UI Designer for Innovative AI/ML EdTech Application

description: The Salesforce Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing customized solutions on the Salesforce platform to enhance business operations. This includes collaborating with teams to identify business requirements, create tailored applications, and integrate Salesforce with other systems to streamline processes such as supply chain management, inventory tracking, and customer relationship management. Responsibilities: - Develop custom applications and workflows using Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning Web Components. - Integrate Salesforce with ERP systems, inventory tools, and other software. - Automate manufacturing processes (e.g., order management and production tracking). - Collaborate with teams to gather requirements and deliver scalable solutions. - Maintain system updates and ensure data accuracy through regular cleanup and reporting Requirements: The ideal candidate should possess the following skills and experience: Salesforce Integration Expertise: Ability to integrate Salesforce with various platforms, including: - Zendesk for customer support and ticketing system integration. - Email Marketing Platform for managing and automating marketing campaigns. - Shopify for integrating e-commerce sales data and operations. - Custom ERP System to align enterprise resource planning with Salesforce functionalities. - VOIP Service (ClearlyIP) for seamless communication between Salesforce and VOIP systems. - Other platforms as needed. Dashboard & Reporting Skills: - Expertise in creating custom dashboards and reports in Salesforce for sales insights. - Ability to design visual tools that enhance performance and decision-making. Sales Team Best Practices: - Experience implementing Salesforce best practices to improve sales workflows. - Skilled in optimizing Salesforce for sales process efficiency and team productivity.
title: Salesforce Developer

description: Job Title: HubSpot CRM Specialist for Contact List Import and Training Description: I'm looking to hire an experienced HubSpot expert who can assist me with quickly and efficiently importing contact lists into my HubSpot CRM system. I'm having difficulty with the learning curve and need help cleaning up .csv files to ensure a smooth transfer. This role involves not just completing the task but also teaching me how it's done. The ideal candidate will work with me via Zoom screen share so I can observe and learn the process. I'm looking for someone who has: Extensive experience with HubSpot, particularly in CRM setup and contact management. Strong skills in cleaning and organizing data in .csv files for seamless HubSpot imports. The ability to explain their process clearly and patiently while working on the task. This is an urgent project, so I need someone who can start immediately and work quickly. Future opportunities for additional HubSpot assistance may also be available based on this experience. Responsibilities: Clean up and prepare .csv files for HubSpot import. Import contacts into HubSpot efficiently and accurately. Teach me the process during a live Zoom screen share session. Provide actionable tips for managing and maintaining a clean CRM system. Requirements: Proven experience with HubSpot CRM and data management. Strong understanding of .csv file preparation and data cleaning. Excellent communication skills and the ability to explain technical processes. Availability to start immediately and work within a quick turnaround. If you're highly skilled with HubSpot and can deliver both the task and training effectively, I'd love to work with you! How to Apply: Please submit your application with: A brief description of your HubSpot experience. An example of a similar task you've completed. Your availability to start. Looking forward to your applications!
title: HubSpot Expert Needed for CRM Setup, Data Import, and Live Training

description: NEED IMMEDIATE FAST TURNAROUND LCD SOFTWARE FIX: MUST KNOW BOTH MICROPYTHON AND C VERY WELL. Need to have experience with ST7735 LCD Driver. Also experience with the ILI9341. PCB Boards are completed and connected, and software written but the LCD screens are still not function properly (partially but not properly). Manufacturer sent their board. Need immediate fix this weekend before Christmas. Will pay well to resolve issue. PCB and screen will be overnighted to you.
title: IMMEDIATE TURNAROUND LCD FIX: MICROPYTHON AND C FIX FOR ST7735 LCD SCREEN Driver or ILI9341. URGENT!

description: We are seeking a Virtual Assistant to provide administrative support to our team while working remotely. The ideal candidate will handle administrative projects and deliver high-quality work with minimal supervision. Responsibilities: - Organize communication via emails and phone calls - Organize meetings and accommodations - Manage contact lists and organize managers’ calendars - Maintain and update customer relationship management (CRM) software and keep online records - Conduct market research and report findings - Prepare presentations - Assist employees with administrative queries Requirements: - 2+ years of experience as a Virtual Assistant or in a similar role - Proficiency with current technologies, including desktop sharing, cloud services, and VoIP - Strong experience with word-processing software and spreadsheets, particularly MS Office - Familiarity with online calendars and scheduling tools, especially Outlook - Excellent phone, email, and instant messaging communication skills - Strong organizational and time management skills - High school diploma; additional qualifications as an Administrator or Executive Assistant are a plus Preferred Skills: - Ability to work independently and handle multiple tasks simultaneously - Strong attention to detail and problem-solving skills
title: Virtual Assistant

description: Job Title: DevSecOps Engineer / Cloud Infrastructure Architect Location: Remote / Hybrid (Flexible) Employment Type: Gig / Part / Full-Time Industry: Cloud Infrastructure, Cybersecurity, and Application Integration About the Role CruxTech is a startup looking for an experienced and motivated DevSecOps Engineer/Architect to configure, implement, and integrate a highly scalable, secure, and observable platform based on Rocky Linux and cloud-native technologies. This role will be pivotal in implementing Zero Trust Architecture (ZTA) principles, a service mesh (Istio), and microservices orchestration using OKD (Kubernetes) and Docker. The ideal candidate should be able to work independently, meet milestone objectives, and have verifiable expertise in building and maintaining modern infrastructures with a focus on security, scalability, and resilience. You will work closely with the Chief Technical Officer to ensure all software components integrate seamlessly to meet customer objectives. Key Responsibilities Platform Design and Implementation • Implement and integrate a Rocky Linux-based infrastructure that supports microservices, middleware, and containerized applications. • Deploy and configure OKD (Kubernetes) and Docker for orchestrating containerized microservices. • Implement and configure Istio/Linkerd service mesh for traffic management, security, and observability. Security and Zero Trust Architecture • Develop and integrate Zero Trust Architecture principles, including: o Mutual TLS (mTLS) for secure communication between services. o Authentication, authorization, and role-based access controls (RBAC) using Keycloak. • Deploy host-based intrusion detection systems (HIDS) such as Wazuh/OSSEC to secure edge devices and servers. • Ensure compliance with STIG/ACASS security guidelines for all system components. Data Management and Middleware • Integrate and manage Kafka (Confluent) for real-time data streaming and message brokering. • Implement persistent storage solutions for containers, such as GlusterFS or Ceph. Monitoring, Observability, and Analytics • Implement comprehensive observability tools: o Metrics collection using Prometheus. o Log aggregation and analysis using ELK Stack or Graylog. o Distributed tracing with Jaeger or Zipkin. • Monitor system health, performance, and security, proactively addressing issues. Automation and CI/CD • Maintain CI/CD pipelines for automated deployments using tools like Ansible, Jenkins, or GitLab CI/CD. • Automate infrastructure management with Terraform or other Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) tools. Collaboration and Documentation • Collaborate with Leadership and development teams to ensure secure and scalable microservices deployments. • Document system designs, configurations, and best practices for internal teams. Required Qualifications Technical Skills • Operating Systems: Expertise in Rocky Linux / Red Hat Linux-based environments. • Containers and Orchestration: o Strong knowledge of Docker and container orchestration tools like OKD or Red Hat Open Shift (Kubernetes). • Service Mesh: Experience implementing and managing Istio or Linkerd for microservice communication. • Security: o Strong understanding of Zero Trust Architecture (ZTA) principles. o Experience with security tools like Wazuh, OSSEC, SELinux, and Firewalld. • Middleware: o Hands-on experience with message streaming platforms like Apache Kafka. • Observability: o Experience with monitoring and logging tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, and the ELK Stack. • Networking: o Familiarity with load balancing, mTLS encryption, DNS, and network security. • Automation: o Experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform or Ansible. o CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or similar). Soft Skills • Strong communication and documentation skills. • Ability to work independently and meet deadlines. • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Preferred Qualifications • Familiarity with STIG/ACASS compliance and cybersecurity standards. • Experience with FreeIPA or Keycloak for identity and access management. • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and edge computing. • Previous experience implementing service meshes in production environments. Why Join Us? • Opportunity to be part of the startup team that is building a cutting-edge infrastructure solution to support local, state, and federal customers. • Work independently with flexibility to develop a scalable and secure framework that will scale from small to enterprise levels. • Key contributor to shaping CruxTech Zero Trust security architectures and scalable cloud-native platform. Compensation • Salary requirements negotiable based on experience.
title: Rocky Linux DEVSECOPS / Cloud Infrastructure Developer

description: 1. Search Algorithm: You will need to develop or implement a search algorithm that can crawl the web, index pages, and provide relevant results to users based on their queries. 2. Web Crawlers: You will need to design and implement web crawlers that can traverse the web and collect data from web pages to create an index of all the web pages. 3. Indexing and storage: You will need to store the data collected by the crawlers and create an index that allows for efficient search and retrieval of relevant information. 4. User Interface: You will need to design a user-friendly interface that allows users to enter search queries and receive results that are relevant and easy to navigate. 5. Hardware: Depending on the scale of your search engine, you may need to invest in powerful hardware to handle the heavy computational demands of indexing and searching the web. 6. Data privacy: You will need to ensure that your search engine website is compliant with data privacy regulations, such as GDPR, and that user data is securely stored and protected. 7. Maintenance: You will need to continuously update and maintain your search engine website to ensure that it remains up-to-date and relevant to users.
title: Partnership Proposal - Search Algorithm

description: We are actively seeking a highly skilled and motivated developer to join our dynamic team, where you will play a crucial role in designing, implementing, and maintaining robust server-side systems, Application Programming Interfaces (APIs), and databases. As a key member of our development team, you will be responsible for ensuring the optimal functionality, performance, and scalability of our applications, which are vital to our business operations and user experiences. In this role, you will collaborate closely with our talented front-end development team to create seamless and efficient integrations between the user interface and server-side components. Your contributions will ensure that our applications deliver a smooth and responsive experience for our users, regardless of the complexity of the underlying processes. Strong problem-solving skills are essential, as you will encounter challenges that require innovative solutions and the ability to think critically under pressure. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in various database technologies, including but not limited to relational databases, NoSQL databases, and data modeling techniques. You should possess a deep understanding of how to optimize database performance and manage data integrity, ensuring that our systems can handle large volumes of transactions and data without compromising on speed or reliability. In addition to technical expertise, we are looking for someone passionate about building efficient, scalable, and reliable systems. You should take pride in writing clean, maintainable code and be committed to following best practices in software development. Your enthusiasm for continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends will be highly valued in our fast-paced and ever-evolving environment. As part of our team, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects that have a significant impact on our business and our customers. We encourage a collaborative and inclusive culture where your ideas are welcomed and valued. If you are ready to take on new challenges and contribute to the development of cutting-edge solutions, we would love to hear from you! Join us in our mission to create exceptional applications that make a difference.
title: Server-Side Systems and API Developer

We need to understand how we need to tax the proposed services (i.e. What is sales taxable and what is not in Illinois). We may also have some questions around what we need to do to be able to collect tax. We are an Ohio business.

description: We are looking for a motivated and skilled Full Stack Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in building and maintaining applications using C#, MSSQL, and WebAPI. While initially focusing on WinForms, the role will also play a crucial part in our transition to a React-based web platform. Key Responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain WinForms applications and RESTful APIs using C# and WebAPI. Build and optimize database queries, including writing and maintaining complex stored procedures in MSSQL. Implement CQRS (Command Query Responsibility Segregation) patterns for scalable and efficient application design. Collaborate with the team to plan and execute the migration of existing applications to a web-based React platform. Ensure code quality through peer reviews, testing, and adherence to best practices. Troubleshoot and resolve software issues in a timely manner. Stay updated with emerging technologies and propose innovative solutions. Requirements: Proficiency in C#, .NET Framework, and WinForms development. Strong experience with MSSQL, including writing complex stored procedures and optimizing database performance. Solid understanding of RESTful WebAPI design and development. Familiarity with CQRS patterns and their application in real-world projects. Familiarity with frontend web technologies (React is a plus). Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Must be available to work full-time from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM EST. Must be available on Zoom during working hours for communication and collaboration. US-based candidates only. Nice-to-Have: Familiarity with React or other modern JavaScript frameworks. Experience with Excel automation and integration. Familiarity with Ionic framework for mobile development. Knowledge of modern CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices. Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure.
title: Full-Time C#/SQL Developer

description: We will be hiring 3-5 engineers to build a new software development team in Q1. We have been recruiting organically but this surge will put an undue strain on our hiring managers and interviewing engineers, especially in the early stage of the funnel. We are looking for an experienced technical recruiter/interviewer, preferably with a technical background, to screen resumes, perform video screening calls with candidates, promote selected candidates for deeper technical interview, coordinate interviews, and manage the recruiting pipeline. I expect January to be about 40% allocated, February at about 25% and tapering off in March, once we have hired the team.

description: Job Description: Contract remote Office Manager for a Boutique Marketing Firm Part Time Hours (20-25 hrs/week) Core Hours: 9am-3pm US Eastern Time Pay will be commensurate with experience and skill set, $25/hour starting Who we are: We are a dynamic lead generation company specializing in the financial advisor sector. Our focus is to generate and sell qualified leads to our niche client base. We value integrity, good work, professionalism, and follow-through. Our goal is to foster a thriving, successful organization that truly makes everyone’s lives better - our customers, our staff, and our strategic partners. Who you are: As the remote Office Manager, you will be at the forefront of supporting our founder, and being the organizational hub between our clients, our call team, and managing onboarding / offboarding, and all the various small things that pop up. You will also play a pivotal role in our business by onboarding and supporting our growing clientele through learning our existing processes, ensuring they are properly documented, and improving them wherever possible. There will be a customer-facing component to this position as well, making sure our clients are onboarded smoothly, have all questions and problems addressed quickly and completely, and have clear communication along the way. Key Responsibilities: •Engage in daily check-ins with the founder to outline daily/weekly tasks and follow-ups. •Be reachable on slack during work hours, with quick response time. •Monitor progress across all company operations and sales; review the data, highlight what’s important and respond appropriately. •Cultivate and maintain relationships with key partners. Ensure up-to-date data tracking across platforms. Efficiently handle miscellaneous tasks delegated to you. •Onboarding / Offboarding clients •Customer service (we tend to get 1-2 emails a day, and 1-2 calls a day. This is an important but small part of the role) Requirements: •Minimum of 2 years of experience in administrative or operations roles is favored. However, proven competence will be highly valued. •A penchant for organization is crucial. You like to organize information and bring closure to projects. You are adept at following structured plans and thrive in bringing systems and processes to your environment •Unwavering attention to detail. •A satisfaction in curating and ticking off task lists is essential. You are good at confirming priorities, charting progress, and seeing opportunities to reduce inconsistencies. •No minimum education prerequisites. Preferred Qualifications: •Proficiency in tools such as Google Calendar, G Suite, G Mail, G Docs •CRM platforms such as: Pipedrive or similar, Calendly •Experience with the High Level platform is a huge plus •A comfortable grasp on spreadsheets •Able to map out workflows and follow them •Able to create / manage process checklists in a tool like Asana or Clickup. •Familiarity with these tools a plus (but not a dealbreaker if not, they are teachable skills): Zapier, Active Campaign Application: To be considered for this position, you need to send a custom cover letter explaining the following: • Why you feel you would be a fit • Software listed that you currently have familiarity with • The location and time zone you are in This position will start between Jan 6 and Jan 15 2025.
title: Contract remote Office Manager for a Boutique Marketing Firm

description: Provide us with your resume for this position, We are seeking a diligent Insurance Follow-Up Specialist to join our team As an Insurance Follow-Up Specialist, you will be handling various responsibilities related to claim reviews and provider appeals. Your role will also include addressing business problems and issues that emerge during the course of an appeal review. We offer a short term contract employment opportunity in this role. Responsibilities: • Conducting comprehensive reviews of post claim review provider appeals in a timely manner. • Providing advice and support to Provider Relations Representatives on complex issues. • Identifying and addressing business challenges and problems that arise during an appeal review. • Collaborating with other departments to implement changes to policies. • Proposing and suggesting training opportunities for other departments on the provider appeals process. • Processing and managing customer credit applications with accuracy and efficiency. • Maintaining accurate and up-to-date customer credit records. • Monitoring customer accounts and taking necessary action as required. • Resolving customer inquiries in a timely and detail oriented manner.• Proficient in Appeals and Claim Administration • Prior experience in a similar role within the insurance industry • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal • Ability to handle multiple tasks and prioritize workload effectively • Strong attention to detail and the ability to work accurately under pressure • Proficiency in using computer systems and software related to job duties • Solid understanding of insurance policies, procedures, and regulations • Ability to work collaboratively as part of a team • High level of integrity and discretion in handling confidential information • Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to think strategically and act tactically • Ability to understand and interpret complex insurance claims and appeals • Proven track record of following up on insurance claims and appeals in a timely manner • Demonstrated ability to handle difficult customer situations with patience and professionalism.
title: Insurance Follow-Up Specialist

description: About Us: Small accounting firm with 5-person staff providing top-tier bookkeeping and accounting services to small businesses primarily in the Southeast United States. Role Overview: We’re seeking a skilled and experienced Senior Accountant to review and analyze financial data, mentor entry-level bookkeepers, and ensure accuracy in client accounts. This is a contract position with an initial commitment of 10 hours per week, with the potential to grow to 20 hours per week if desired. Responsibilities: • Review and Analyze Financials: Conduct detailed reviews of balance sheets, profit and loss statements, and other financial reports for accuracy and compliance. • Provide Feedback and Mentor Bookkeepers: Document errors and provide feedback (written and via video calls) to entry-level bookkeepers to support their learning and improvement. • Reconciliations and Adjustments: Perform complex reconciliations (e.g., payroll liabilities, sales tax liabilities) and create adjusting journal entries as necessary. • Client Communication: Request statements and documents from clients via email and follow up with non-responsive clients every 7 days. • Collaborate with Offshore Team: Work effectively with offshore bookkeepers, providing guidance and support as needed. • SOP Creation and Refinement: Develop and refine Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for our various client teams (preferred but not required). • Meeting Availability: Have some availability for video calls during the hours of 8:30 AM to 1:30 PM EST, Monday through Friday, to collaborate with our offshore team. Requirements: • At least 2 years of experience in accounting or bookkeeping roles. • Prior experience in roles with direct reports, regardless of industry. • In-depth knowledge of when to capitalize purchases, how to manage equity accounts, and analyze financial reports. • Expertise in reconciling complex transactions and resolving unreconciled balances. • Ability to document feedback and support entry-level bookkeepers’ development. • Familiarity with the flow of bookkeeping and financial statements to Schedule C and 1120S forms. • Strong communication skills (both written and verbal). • Must be based in the United States. • Minimum 10 hours per week, with up to 20 hours available if desired. • Reliable laptop with Windows 10 or 11 (software such as MS365 will be provided). • Must pass a background check. Assessment Process: Selected candidates will complete a paid 1–2 hour assessment independently. This assessment evaluates their ability to analyze financial statements and provide constructive feedback to bookkeepers. If you are a detail-oriented accounting professional with a passion for mentoring and improving financial workflows, we’d love to hear from you! Apply today to join our remote team and grow with us.
title: Senior Accountant – 100% Remote

description: Description The IT Endpoint Management Analyst will be responsible for working with the Endpoint Management Engineers in implementing and maintaining Enterprise-class products to support Windows desktops and server environments. This includes Operating System configuration and deployment, as well as software, drivers, patches, and other items that can be centrally deployed and managed. Additionally, the IT Desktop Analyst is responsible for creating, maintaining, monitoring, and reporting on application deployments and systems managed by the IT Endpoint Management team. As well as working with the team to maintain these systems to ensure a high level of quality control and a positive end user experience with firm applications. Key Responsibilities • Work with other teams to understand and provide assistance for any necessary integrations with products maintained by the Endpoint Management team. • Work with Engineers to design, implement and maintain a standard desktop platform for firm applications. o Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT) SCCM Integration for task sequence creation and maintenance. o Gold image creation with Windows 10 for both physical and Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI). o Autopilot configuration and deployment using Microsoft Intune. o Create and test standardized installations for approved applications in order to automate delivery to endpoints. • Software update patch management using SCCM and Ivanti Patch for SCCM o Patching of Microsoft operating systems, Microsoft Office products, and third party products such as Java, Zoom, Flash, Adobe Acrobat, etc. • Knowledge with creation/implementation/maintenance of Microsoft Group Policy and Intune policies for management of the Windows desktop environment • Basic knowledge with scripting in Windows PowerShell • Develop and manage Quality Assurance processes to provide assurance and credibility that workstations and deployments function correctly. • Consult with technical staff and users on the evaluation and integration of new and/or specialized technologies. • Maintain up-to-date knowledge of PC hardware specifications and configurations. • Ability to triage issues; work with internal teams and vendor support to drive resolution. • Generating reports and report templates to show compliance with current policies and deployments. • Incident and problem response through the Service Now ticketing system. • Special projects and additional duties as assigned.
title: IT Endpoint Architect - MDT, SCCM, Autopilot, Intune

description: Attach resume for this position, seeking a Associate Technical Support Analyst for a contract with our client in US. This role is an ongoing contract wtih a Mon-Fri shift of 4:30 pm-12:30 AM. Target start date is January 5th with interviews taking place this year stroke next year of January 3rd. Team supports end users at over 900 retail and supply chain locations, resolving hardware, software, network, and/or peripheral issues. You will receive calls from in-store, retail personnel related to in-store Infrastructure issues, independently working those issues to resolution following established incident handling processes and meeting resolution SLAs. You are encouraged to suggest knowledge or process changes to improve service delivery. You will be responsible to identify problem impacts and escalate potential systemic issues, following Problem Management processes. Promotion within the team is typical with outstanding performance. Transfer to other areas of corporate IT is supported. Key Responsibiities: Receive calls from retail store and supply chain locations to independently resolve IT issues, using provided ServiceNow knowledge base. Perform remote troubleshooting through diagnostic techniques and probing questions and determine the best solution based on the issue, troubleshooting findings, and details provided by callers Perform outbound calls to resolve ongoing issues are also performed. Work with retail personnel, IT support groups (L3, Engineering, RTI, etc.) and various service technicians to resolve issues and escalate new or systemic issues to the next tier of support Acknowledge and update incidents for work performed in Client ITSM to restore service Perform queue management tasks like incident acknowledgement, incident assignment, task reviews, etc. Coordinate dispatch of third party service technicians to restore service to IT equipment at remote locations Participate in the training/onboarding of new hires, including New Hire Mentorship. Participate in development testing of new tools and processes. Ability to take on new projects and special assignments. Take an active role in incident and problem investigations, identifying and escalating potential systemic issues.
title: Associate Technical Support Anaylst

description: We are seeking a detail-oriented and experienced QA Tester to ensure the quality and functionality of our mobile applications on both iOS and Android platforms. The ideal candidate will have a strong passion for app testing, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to communicate effectively with developers. This role involves manual testing on multiple devices, creating test plans, identifying and documenting issues, and recommending fixes in line with best practices and platform-specific policies. Responsibilities: • Manual Testing: o Perform detailed manual QA testing of our app across multiple devices, including:  iPhone (small and large screens)  iPad  Samsung (small and large screens)  Google Pixel devices • Test Planning: o Create comprehensive test plans and execute test cases effectively. • Issue Reporting: o Identify and report issues with detailed descriptions, links, screenshots, and improvement suggestions. o Communicate recommended fixes to developers, adhering to best practices and industry standards. • Platform-Specific Feedback: o Conduct an in-depth review of the iOS app (currently available on the App Store) and provide detailed feedback, capturing action items and steps to address any errors or bugs, along with constructive criticism. o Review the Android app (pending Google approval) and offer actionable insights to resolve errors and improve user experience. • Recommendations and Compliance: o Outline recommendations for resolving issues based on Apple and Google policies, industry standards, and common user expectations. • Testing Techniques: o Perform various testing techniques including:  Regression Testing  Smoke QA Testing  A/B Testing  Functional Testing  UI Testing • API Testing: o Conduct thorough API testing to ensure seamless functionality. • User Experience Assurance: o Ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience for users while interacting with the platform. Requirements • Proven experience in QA testing for mobile applications. • Familiarity with Apple and Google app guidelines. • Proficiency in writing detailed test plans and executing test cases. • Strong ability to identify, document, and communicate issues clearly. • Hands-on experience with various testing methodologies. • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. • Strong communication skills to liaise effectively with developers and stakeholders. Preferred Qualifications • Experience with automated testing tools is a plus. • Familiarity with Agile development processes. • Prior experience in API testing. How to Apply: If you’re passionate about delivering high-quality mobile applications and have a meticulous eye for detail, we’d love to hear from you. Please send your proposal, a brief cover letter, and examples of past QA projects or reports (if available) to NEXATECH LLC here on Upwork. Join us in ensuring our App’s users have an exceptional experience with our apps!
title: Mobile App Testing: QA Manual Tester Urgently Needed

description: We are seeking a motivated and results-driven Outbound Sales Representative to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for making outbound calls to potential clients, engaging them in meaningful conversations, and pre-qualifying leads for the sales team. Your primary goal is to identify and qualify prospects who have the potential to convert into customers, ensuring a steady flow of high-quality leads for our sales team. You will be inquire about medical health. So you must be able to pronounce medical terms without issues. Key Responsibilities: •⁠ ⁠Make outbound calls to potential clients based on provided lead lists. •⁠ ⁠Engage prospects with a compelling introduction and qualifying questions to assess their needs, interests, and purchasing potential. •⁠ ⁠Use effective communication skills to explain products or services, ensuring prospects understand the value proposition. •⁠ ⁠Qualify leads by gathering necessary information. •⁠ ⁠Document interactions and outcomes in the CRM system, ensuring accurate tracking and follow-up. •⁠ ⁠Schedule appointments or calls for the sales team with qualified leads. •⁠ ⁠Achieve daily, weekly, and monthly call and lead qualification targets. •⁠ ⁠Maintain a positive, professional, and helpful attitude with prospects to foster trust and build relationships. Skills and Qualifications: •⁠ ⁠Proven experience in outbound calling, telesales, or lead generation. •⁠ ⁠Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written. •⁠ ⁠Strong ability to engage prospects and ask insightful qualifying questions. •⁠ ⁠Ability to quickly learn and understand products or services being offered. •⁠ ⁠Comfortable using CRM tools or sales software to log and manage leads. •⁠ ⁠Results-oriented with a focus on meeting and exceeding lead qualification targets. •⁠ ⁠High level of persistence, resilience, and motivation to handle rejection. •⁠ ⁠Strong organizational skills and the ability to multitask effectively. Preferred Qualifications: •⁠ ⁠Experience in a sales or telemarketing role. •⁠ ⁠Familiarity with sales prospecting strategies and best practices. •⁠ ⁠Experience with customer relationship management (CRM) software.
title: Outbound Sales Representative - Lead Qualification

description: We are seeking two designers to create a homepage mockup for a website redesign. We will offer feedback and then present the designs to our client who will choose one of the designs for the final website. The client is a HVAC & Electrical company that delivers expert solutions for homes and businesses. description: Revenue Management and Listings Optimization Specialist Type: Contract Location: Remote Overview: We are seeking an experienced Revenue Management and Listings Optimization Specialist to assist with maximizing revenue and enhancing the visibility of our short-term rental properties across platforms like Airbnb and Vrbo. This contractor role is ideal for someone with a deep understanding of revenue forecasting, pricing strategies, and online travel agency (OTA) platforms, particularly in the vacation rental industry. This role would be a part-time position on an as-needed basis to begin. The opportunity to transition into a full-time position can be considered depending on performance and business needs. Key Responsibilities: ● Revenue Management & Forecasting: ○ Conduct revenue analysis and create accurate, data-driven revenue projections for short-term rental properties. ○ Monitor market trends, competitor pricing, and occupancy rates to inform pricing and inventory strategies. ○ Implement company directives regarding discounts, promotions, pricing strategy, and other pricing adjustments as instructed. ● Listings Updates & Optimization: ○ Optimize property listings on platforms such as Airbnb, Vrbo, and others to improve search rankings and increase bookings. ○ Ensure all listing content, including descriptions, photos, and amenities, is up-to-date and compelling. ○ Implement A/B testing and data-driven improvements to listing performance. ● Reporting & Analysis: ○ Provide regular performance reports, including booking trends, revenue metrics, and insights into areas for improvement. ○ Analyze booking data to identify growth opportunities and adjust strategies accordingly. ● Collaboration & Support: ○ Work closely with management to align revenue goals with market realities. ○ Offer insights and recommendations for improving guest satisfaction and review scores to drive repeat bookings. Qualifications: ● Proven experience in revenue management and revenue forecasting for short-term or vacation rentals. ● Familiarity with online travel agencies (OTAs) like Airbnb, Vrbo, and others. ● Strong analytical skills and proficiency in revenue management tools or software. ● Expertise in listing optimization strategies to improve visibility and conversion rates. ● Excellent written and verbal communication skills. ● Ability to work independently, meet deadlines, and adapt to a dynamic market environment. Preferred Qualifications: ● Experience with dynamic pricing tools such as Wheelhouse, Beyond Pricing, or PriceLabs. ● Knowledge of property management systems (PMS) and their integration with OTA platforms. ● Familiarity with short-term rental industry regulations and trends. Compensation: This is a contractor position with competitive hourly rates or project-based compensation, depending on experience and scope of work.
title: Revenue Management and Listings Optimization Specialist

description: I am a licensed dentist with extensive experience in implantology and have developed a novel dental implant system for retaining removable prosthetic devices. I am seeking a highly skilled and professional mechanical engineer with extensive experience in SolidWorks or ANSYS to bring my designs to life and ensure they meet the highest standards of precision and functionality. An NDA is required before discussing this project. Key Responsibilities: • Collaborate to refine and develop existing designs for a dental implant system. • Utilize SolidWorks or similar software to create detailed 3D CAD models. • Conduct finite element analysis (FEA) using SolidWorks and/or ANSYS or equivalent tools to evaluate and optimize designs. • Work with reputable FEA engineers as needed to ensure accuracy and reliability in simulations. • Provide feedback and suggestions to improve design durability, efficiency, and manufacturability. • Maintain a professional approach to timelines and deliverables, ensuring projects are completed on time and with meticulous attention to detail. Requirements: • Proven experience in mechanical design, preferably in the medical or dental device industry. • Mastery of SolidWorks, ANSYS, or equivalent CAD and FEA software. • Strong understanding of engineering principles, particularly in materials and stress analysis. • Ability to communicate effectively, ask insightful questions, and incorporate feedback. • A commitment to professionalism, attention to detail, and delivering high-quality work. Preferred Qualifications: • Previous experience with dental implant or prosthetic device design. • Access to and collaboration with reputable FEA engineers. • Familiarity with regulatory considerations in medical device design. What I Offer: This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to an innovative dental implant system. You will work closely with a dedicated professional and have the chance to be part of a project that prioritizes quality and ingenuity. If you meet the above qualifications and are eager to take on this challenging and rewarding project, please submit your proposal, including a portfolio of relevant work. Let’s work together to create something extraordinary!
title: Mechanical Engineer for Dental Implant System Design with Excellent Professional Design Capabilities

description: Job Overview: We are looking for an experienced freelance software engineer to develop a Chrome extension that automates webpage interactions on a specific platform. The extension will streamline a manual process by scanning a webpage, identifying specific elements (e.g., "Claim Ride" buttons), and triggering actions programmatically. The ideal candidate has hands-on experience with browser extension development, especially for Chrome, and a strong understanding of JavaScript and web automation. Project Scope: Develop a Chrome extension that automates webpage interactions. Implement a script to scan for and interact with specific elements on the page. Handle navigation through dynamic web pages and maintain session states. Add optional features such as filtering elements by specified criteria (e.g., region-based ride selection). Ensure compliance with Chrome Manifest v3 standards. Test, debug, and optimize the extension for reliability. Deliver user-friendly documentation and instructions. Key Skills Required: Strong proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Experience with Chrome extension development (Manifest v3). Knowledge of DOM manipulation and event handling. Familiarity with debugging tools like Chrome DevTools. Ability to handle asynchronous tasks and dynamic web content. (Optional) Experience with API integration or advanced web scraping techniques. Deliverables: A fully functional Chrome extension that meets the outlined requirements. Testing and debugging to ensure seamless performance. Documentation, including a user guide and developer notes. Preferred Qualifications: A portfolio showcasing Chrome extensions or similar web automation tools. Experience with dynamic or content-refreshing web pages. Strong communication skills and ability to provide progress updates. How to Apply: Please include the following in your proposal: A brief introduction, including your relevant experience and qualifications. Links to any Chrome extensions or similar projects you’ve worked on. Your availability and estimated timeline for the project. Your proposed budget or hourly rate. We look forward to working with a talented developer who can bring this project to life.
title: Chrome Extension Developer – Web Automation Project
